item.title: Log Git Commands
item.description: Kepp a log of all your git commands

Neo Financial

Being among the pioneering members of the iOS development team at Neo Financial, I significantly influenced the direction of the Neo app’s development. Starting as an Intermediate Developer, my commitment, skills, and collaborative approach led to my promotion to Senior Developer within two years. During my time at Neo, I achieved several notable milestones, including:

item.title: Meet the man behind the code
item.description: I’m a part-time comedian to a captivatingly stubborn red Pembroke Welsh Corgi named Ginger, full-time iOS developer, and master of multitasking between family and Swift syntax. My iOS journey began in 2013 when I had to make a walking app for my Masters project. Learning Objective-C in just three months was tough, but I fell in love with app development right away. After graduation, I made an expense-tracking app called “My Cost”. I maintained it for a while until I decided to pursue a Ph.D. in computer science, focusing on finding anomalies in big data with neural networks. Throughout my tenure as a freelance iOS developer, I had the privilege of collaborating with various companies, taking projects from conception to completion. Each app listed below represents a culmination of my skills, creativity, and dedication to delivering high-quality mobile experiences. While I’ve moved on from contractor work, the responsibility for maintaining these apps now rests with other developers. In 2020, I made the leap to become a full-time iOS developer and joined Neo Financial, a company dedicated to revolutionizing the banking experience for Canadians.
